description: Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
full_summary:
================================PasswordEncoder
National Capital Region (NCR) Temporary Help Services Tender Announcement
------------------------------------------------------------

RFP Reference Number: S4510594
Publication Date: July 11, 2023

### Request for Proposal (RFP) Overview

The Department of National Defense (DND) invites qualified supply arrangement holders to submit a proposal for Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Summary of Requirements
This requirement is open only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the Computer - Application Support stream and category.

We are seeking a temporary help services provider to support DND's ongoing operations. The required level of security is Secret.

#### Notice Details

*   Rentention Date: July 11, 2023
*   Closing Date: July 17, 2023, at 08:00:00
*   Contracting Entity: Department of National Defense
*   Address: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H8G1, Canada
*   Fax: Not available
*   Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
*   Phone: (613) 971-7955
*   Attachment [Temporary Help Services Requirement .pdf][1]

This tender notice is available at [Canada Buys.][2]

Tender bid acceptance and acceptance documents available at [Canada Buys][3].

This Contract is open to traders with their head or Chief office within National Capital Region(NCR).

### Tender Documents
Please follow the link provided to view the RFP's [PDF documents][4]. 
The RFP can also be obtained by completing a Request for Supply Arrangement Procurement Document in .zip format.

Please do not hesitate to contact
    CFSG(O-G) Temp Help at CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca 
    if you have any questions.

Note:
No late bids will be accepted.

### Additional Advice
Effective communication with the tender team is crucial. Please be prepared to discuss your proposal via videoconferencing if you are invited to do so.

**Important Updates**

*   An RFP modification notice is not included in this contract document.
*   This modification notice is current.

 Refer to [Canada Buys] for all tender notices, request for proposals (RFPs), contract awards and more.

**Disclosure Statement**
No
